ineffective.translation[0].definitions[0: something that is ineffective does not achieve what it is intended to achieve
The chemical was almost totally ineffective in killing the weeds.
Various drugs have proved ineffective against the virus.
ineffective.translation[0].note_box[0].i: In everyday English, people usually say that something does not work rather than saying that it is ineffective:
These drugs donâ€™t work against bird flu.
